roles.label: Admin
roles.description: Site administrator. Full access. Overrides individual permissions.

roles.label: Content Editor
roles.description: Content editors can add/delete/modify all bulletinboard content.

roles.label: Bulletinboard Settings
roles.description: User can change bulletinboard settings (Colors, header, layouts, ticker)

roles.label: App Settings
roles.description: User can change general app settings (Name, theme).
